name: figshare.scilifelab.se
description: A data repository powered by Figshare, supported by SciLifeLab and the Knut and Alice Wallenberg foundation through the Data-Driven Life Science (DDLS) program, and the Swedish Foundation for Strategic Research (SSF). It allows life science researchers in Sweden to publish and share any kind of research-related data, such as documents, figures, or presentations. The repository is not limited to restricted data sharing or temporary storage; all data is expected to be public at some point, though embargo and metadata-only records are supported for controlled access. It is not meant for non-public or exclusively shared data. Data is citable via DOI and can be integrated with publication, funding, and version control systems.
